name: nosubvod-twitch
description: Show sub-only VOD on Twitch (TypeScript version)

scripts.build: esbuild src/page_init.ts src/app.ts src/patch_amazonworker.ts src/inject.ts src/nosubvod.ts src/restriction-remover.ts --bundle --outdir=dist --platform=browser --format=iife --minify
scripts.watch: esbuild src/page_init.ts src/app.ts src/patch_amazonworker.ts src/inject.ts src/nosubvod.ts src/restriction-remover.ts --bundle --outdir=dist --platform=browser --format=iife --watch
